At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. In terms of next steps, what is the best next step for you?  
choose:  
A. I fly forward and rise.  
B. I descend and then turn around.  
C. I rotate the camera downward.  
D. I turn left and go up.  
E. I fly forward while descending.
